snippet: Katie Beers has written a book about her kidnapping as a 9-year-old on Long Island, and how she has managed to beat the odds since then.
abstract: Katie Beers, who was kidnapped and abused in a dungeon on Long Island two decades ago, is embarking on media campaign in effort to promote a memoir that, she says, has long been in the back of her mind.
lead_paragraph: Katie Beers has written a book about her kidnapping as a 9-year-old on Long Island, and how she has managed to beat the odds since then.

headline.seo: A Girl Held for 16 Days in a Dungeon, Now Looking Back as a Woman
headline.main: A Girl Held for 16 Days in a Dungeon, Now Looking Back as a Woman
headline.print_headline: A Girl Held for 16 Days in a Dungeon, Now Looking Back as a Woman
